Special title page (leaf [129]) for: Discours de la philosophie a Passicharis et a Rodanthe. -- A Paris : Pour Felix le Mangnier ..., 1584. [original]
Brunet, t. 3, col. 498 describes a Second volume, with imprint: Paris : Felix Le Mangnier, 1584. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Duru, 1859. In uniform binding with: Oeuures poetiques d'Amadis Iamyn. -- A Paris, 1579. Bookplate of Lucien Double. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 402, v.2. [original]
